title: Hilton defends ‘creepy’ shower photo
text:
Perez Hilton sparks Twitter backlash after posting picture of shower with son Network Writer News Corp Australia Network Perez Hilton sparks Twitter backlash after posting picture of shower with son Network Writer News Corp Australia Network Backlash ... Perez Hilton has been slammed on Twitter for his parenting skills. 
CELEBRITY blogger Perez Hilton is under fire for sharing a photograph of himself in the shower with his two-year-old son. 
Hilton posted the happy snap on Instagram with the caption: “Our family motto is: #fun! We try and incorporate fun into as much of the everyday things we do! #Bathtime.” 
But the picture sparked a flood of comments on social media, with some branding the image “creepy” and another going so far as to call it “child abuse”. Our family motto is: #fun ! We try and incorporate fun into as much of the everyday things... https://t.co/jiUhFNsS4I pic.twitter.com/tchnDi0Eqe — Perez Hilton (@PerezHilton) October 3, 2015 
Other Twitter users were sympathetic to Hilton and backed his parenting skills. 
“There’s nothing wrong with showering with your kids - it’s how they learn,” said one user. 
As the backlash grew, Hilton took to Twitter to defend himself, writing: “Say what you will about me professionally, I KNOW that personally I am an awesome dad!!! Other Stories
